list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nút chai bật và kính lengeng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: go somewhere for a short time, often without notice.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she popped in to see if she could help
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô xuất hiện để xem liệu cô có thể giúp gì không?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person's eyes) bulge or appear to bulge when opened wide, especially as an indication of surprise.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the man's eyes popped in disbelief
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đôi mắt của người đàn ông bật lên trong sự hoài nghi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: appear brighter or more striking in juxtaposition with something of a different or complementary color.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she added a slick of red lipstick to make the outfit pop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy đã thêm một son môi màu đỏ để làm cho trang phục pop

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: people who obsessively drink and pop pills
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những người thiếu thuốc ám ảnh và thuốc pop

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a batter) hit a pop fly.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: at first there were just a few pops, perhaps from pistols
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lúc đầu chỉ có một vài pops, có lẽ từ súng lục

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I like wearing a neutral outfit with one pop of yellow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi thích mặc một bộ trang phục trung tính với một màu vàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a ball hit high in the air but not deep, providing an easy catch.
commercial popular music, in particular accessible, tuneful music of a kind popular since the 1950s and sometimes contrasted with rock, soul, or other forms of popular music.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their quasi-psychedelic pop is pleasantly uplifting and danceable
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: pop psychedelic của họ là dễ dàng thăng hoa và nhảy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: point of presence, denoting equipment that acts as access to the internet.
point of purchase, denoting products or promotions located adjacent to a retail checkout or cashier.
